General.Name: Cano Health Inc
General.Description: Cano Health, Inc. provides primary care medical services to its members in the United States and Puerto Rico. It owns and operates medical centers enabled by CanoPanorama, a proprietary population health management technology-powered platform that provides the healthcare providers at its medical centers with a 360-degree view of their members with actionable insights to improve care decisions and member engagement. The company also operates pharmacies, as well as provides dental services in its medical centers. Cano Health, Inc. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Miami, Florida.
General.Address: 9725 NW 117th Avenue, Miami, FL, United States, 33178
